text:
Mar oh
Twenty-sixth
19 4 0
Mr. M. 3. Novik
Radio Station WYNC
Municipal Broadcasting System
New York City
Dear Noviki
Have you made your 1940 contribution to NAEB?
In checking the roster I find your station
listed as one of the few with dues for 1940
still unpaid, I hope you don't mind my
doubting your memory. A statement was sent
you early in February and if it has been
mis-placed I shall be glad to send you another.
Cordially,
FES/rep
Frank E, Schooled
